name: PrestigeSmart
0:
”Alexa turn on Kettle.”
”Alexa turn off Kettle.”
”Alexa turn on cooker.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your Prestige smart devices using this skill. Simply say Alexa Turn on the Kettle.

Prerequisites
1. Before enabling this skill, you need to install Prestige Smart App in your mobile phone(Android/IOS).
2. Create an account in the mobile app. 
3. Add and configure Prestige smart Home Devices in the App.
4. Also Set names for your devices in the App. The same name will appear in the alexa 

Once done, you can enable this skill. On enabling it'll ask you to link you Prestige smart Account
You can use the same credentials, which you are using in the Prestige smart App. Once linked successfully, you can ask alexa to Discover devices. 
Alexa will find new devices and you'll be able to control them. 

In the future, if you change the names of devices or add or remove devices from your home, they won't reflect automatically here. You have to ask Alexa to discover devices again. 
No need of re-linking account. 

Currently, You'll only see devices added in your default home. Devices added in other homes in the mobile app will not be accessible via Alexa.
